content: enjoy the great outdoors in the toasty warmth of these handmade crochet accessories working in red heart super saver you can easily stitch up a hat mittens and scarf for the whole family practice double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet through back loop ribbing and more this uncomplicated pattern includes sizing for children and 2 adults use favorite colors to please them all scarf approx 7 18 cm x 72 183 cm excluding fringe gauges 12 single_crochet and 15 row = 4 10 cm with larger hook 14 single_crochet and 16 rnds = 4 10 cm with smaller hook
